Head.title: Your key to the DeFiChain ecosystem
Head.desc: Gain access to the DeFi landscape through non-custodial wallets designed for a multitude of requirements.

Header.title: Your key to the DeFiChain ecosystem
Header.desc: Gain access to the DeFi landscape through non-custodial wallets designed for a multitude of requirements.

LightWallets.title: Daily access to DeFiChain
LightWallets.subtitle: These wallets provide lightweight, easy access to DeFiChainâ€™s suite of features. Best suited for users who interact with DeFiChain on a near-daily basis, while not compromising on speed and security of funds.

DFC.title: DeFiChain wallet mobile app
DFC.desc: Lightweight, instant access to Decentralized Finance for Bitcoin, at your fingertips.

DFX.title: DFX wallet mobile app
DFX.desc: Buy and sell DeFiChain assets with simple bank transfers, and use non-custodial DFX wallet to participate in DeFiChain applications such as Liquidity Mining and $DFI Staking.

DownloadSection.title: Downloads
DownloadSection.subtitle: The media assets are released under CCO license. "No Rights Reserved".

FullNodeWallets.title: Advanced usage of DeFiChain
FullNodeWallets.subtitle: Advanced wallets that are suited for complex usage of DeFiChain, such as masternode management, multi-signature management, and more.

DFC.title: DeFi Wallet desktop app
DFC.desc: Transact, liquidity mine, swap and more with the full-featured and fully-decentralized wallet app. Full node included.

RPI.title: DeFi wallet for Raspberry Pi
RPI.desc: A version of the desktop wallet for Raspberry Pi 4B 4GB with official Raspberry Pi OS (32-Bit).

CLI.title: CLI
CLI.desc: Transact and interact with DeFiChain through a command line interface. Full node included.

DFIElectrum.title: DeFiChain Electrum
DFIElectrum.desc: Multi-signature DeFiChain wallet built with Electrum for treasury use cases and more.
